comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: The War Memorial was completed in 1934. Also, Hyde Park has the configuration that was put in after the St James/Museum section of the train line was put in. Thus, this picture is 1934 or later.

comment.author: 29959532@N00
comment._content: Wow...would love to see a comparison of this shot and one taken today to see how much it has changed.

comment.author: 57852479@N00
comment._content: Not the same, but similar... everything has shot upwards! www.sydneyimages.com.au/-/aerial-photography-gallery/sydn...
